newsitem.title: FRANCE: Cap Gemini extends rise on sale increase.
newsitem.headline: Cap Gemini extends rise on sale increase.

text.p: Cap Gemini continued its share rise on Thursday, after reporting a 21.6 percent increase in first half sales on Wednesday which was bigger than expected.
Cap traded 3.16 percent higher at 218.60 francs at 1425 GMT after having gained 3.11 percent on Wednesday.
Since the start of the year the share has increased 53.55 percent.
"The group has announced a bigger rise in sales than was its objective, 20 percent. I'm very postive on the share," said Mathieu Pascal at CCF.
